categories: Category:Imperial Navy admirals of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Dayun was a male who served the Galactic Empire as an admiral in the Imperial Navy during the Galactic Civil War. In 0 ABY, shortly after the Battle of Yavin, Dayun was the commander of the Star Destroyer Implacable. He informed the engineer Lieutenant Commander Del Meeko of his reassignment to the newly formed Inferno Squad.
